data.title: Avid Liquid is now Dazzle DVD Recorder: Get it Now!
data.meta_description: Looking for Avid Liquid? Avid Liquid is now called Dazzle DVD Recorder HD. Get it today and see what all the hype is about!
data.text:
Avid Liquid is now called Dazzle DVD Recorder HD and it is better than ever

After Pinnacle bought Avid Liquid from Avid it discontinued that product and replaced it with Dazzle DVD Recorder HD. With many of the same and many more features as Avid Liquid, Dazzle is the best analog to digital software you can find. Capture your VHS and analog camcorder video and edit them with Pinnacle Studio; one of the best video editing softwares on the market!
